When the law of God is most derided and brought into the most contempt, then it is time for every true follower of Christ, for those whose hearts have been given to 
                                                                           982
God, and who are fixed to obey God, to stand unflinchingly for the faith once delivered to the saints. "Then shall ye return, and discern between the righteous and the wicked, between him that serveth God and him that serveth him not." It is time to fight when champions are most needed (RH June 8, 1897).
